title: Profile Service: Closed Captions
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled MLB user is in MLB.TV App

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN watching a video
AND Turns CC ON
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN update profile service to show CC ON

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN Profile Service has CC ON
AND the user loads Game content

WHEN Profile Service has CC ON
AND the user is watching game content
AND the user backgrounds the app
AND then the user returns to the app

WHEN Profile Service has CC ON
AND the user loads VOD/SVOD content

WHEN Profile Service has CC ON
AND the user is watching VOD/SVOD content
AND the user backgrounds the app
AND then the user returns to the app
WHEN the user changes their favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a POST call is made to the profile service

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user has changed their favorite team
AND the user force closes the app 
AND the user clears app cache
AND the user re-opens the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the change to favorite team persists 
AND the change is reflected in the GET call that happens at app startup
AND the user experience in the app reflects the selected favorite team
